quest.name: An Unwanted Proposal
journal: Y'shtola's thirst for knowledge sated, she seems content to return to Slitherbough.
Y'shtola thanks you and Thancred for your help in infiltrating Woven Oath, bidding you rest when you return to Slitherbough.

You arrive back at Slitherbough and speak with Runar, who has been beside himself with worry over Y'shtola's absence from the village. Relieved to know you are all safe and sound, he suggests taking a seat by the fire to relax while he finishes preparations for your meal.

Runar's stew is nearly ready, and though the guards on patrol have yet to return, he asks you to inform Y'shtola it is time to eat. You approach the door to her chambers, but the sound of arguing from within stops you from knocking. It would seem she has grown exasperated with Urianger's penchant for secrets. Before their talks can reach a satisfying conclusion, however, a shrill cry for help distracts you─Eulmoran soldiers have arrived, and one of the Blessed's guards has been felled by poison.

The Night's Blessed have been given a choice: join the Children of the Everlasting Dark and swear allegiance to Eulmore, or face their retribution. The Scions must move quickly if they are to save the Night's Blessed and deny Vauthry his foothold in the Rak'tika Greatwood.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Glad to see my distraction proved successful.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Let us hurry to Slitherbough. The others are waiting.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: After we've returned, the two of you should rest a while. No doubt Runar will be eager to have you sample his cooking.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: As soon as I discover anything of import, you will be the first to know.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Urianger has tended to Minfilia's wounds, but I fear his garrulous nature has gotten the better of him.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. Now that you're here, there's something I want to ask you.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Urianger told me that Thancred was something of a rogue in the past. “As a wolf among sheep,” he said. What did he mean by that? Do you know?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Rest assured Y'shtola and I shall work with all haste to decipher the tablet and its secrets.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Please, go and rest. Urianger and I will call you the moment we finish.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: Forename! The guard told me you left with Master Matoya to Woven Oath.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: And no sooner do you return than she locks herself away in her chambers without so much as a word.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: She knows how I worry when she leaves without telling me. <sigh> But she is safe, and that is all that matters.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: You must be hungry after such a journey. Why not have a seat there by the fire? The stew will soon be ready.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: I confess I am not the greatest of cooks, but I have yet to hear any complaints.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: That Eulmore has gained a foothold here in these woods bodes ill for the Night's Blessed.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Surely there's something we can do to help the Night's Blessed... Isn't there?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The guard hath been afflicted with a most terrible and efficacious poison.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: We have attempted all manner of healing incantations. Alas, his condition remains unchanged.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: At present, we can but slow the poison's advance. I pray it will afford us sufficient time to find a cure.
